channel.title: CVE Feed for Repute info systems -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Repute info systems -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32706|2024-07-16T14:41:20.934Z -- repute%20info%20systems -- arforms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Repute info systems ARForms.This issue affects ARForms: from n/a through 6.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-32702|2024-06-04T17:50:08.940Z -- repute%20info%20systems -- arforms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Repute info systems ARForms allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects ARForms: from n/a through 6.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-32706|2024-04-24T08:12:03.672Z -- repute%20info%20systems -- arforms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Repute info systems ARForms.This issue affects ARForms: from n/a through 6.4.
